Onboarding.setup: Let's get you set up for cold email success

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: We're here to support your success

faq.q1: How long does the setup process take?
faq.a1: Most users complete the entire onboarding in 30-60 minutes. Domain verification can take up to 24 hours, but you can continue with other steps while waiting.
faq.q2: Do I need technical knowledge to set this up?
faq.a2: Not at all! Our step-by-step guides and video tutorials walk you through everything. For DNS setup, you might need access to your domain registrar, but we provide exact instructions.
faq.q3: Can I skip steps and come back later?
faq.a3: While you can navigate away at any time, we recommend completing steps in order for the best experience. Each step builds on the previous one.
faq.q4: What if I get stuck on a step?
faq.a4: Use the "Need Help?" button below to access our help center, or contact our support team. We're here to help you succeed!

leads.title: Need Quality Leads?
leads.description: Our lead generation service finds verified prospects in your target market.

copy.title: Need Help with Copy?
copy.description: Our copywriting experts create high-converting email sequences for you.

step1.title: Connect Your Domain
step1.subtitle: Set up your sending domain for professional email delivery
step1.explanation: Your domain is the foundation of your email campaigns. By connecting and verifying your domain (like yourcompany.com), you ensure your emails are delivered from a professional address and improve your sender reputation. This step involves adding DNS records to prove you own the domain.

step2.title: Create Mailboxes
step2.subtitle: Create email accounts (mailboxes) to send campaigns from
step2.explanation: Mailboxes are the individual email accounts that will send your campaigns. You can create multiple mailboxes like john@yourcompany.com, sales@yourcompany.com to distribute your sending volume and appear more natural. Each mailbox needs to be properly configured with SMTP settings.

step3.title: Enable Warmup
step3.subtitle: Warming up mailboxes boosts deliverability and reputation
step3.explanation: Email warmup is the process of gradually increasing your sending volume to build a positive sender reputation. Our automated warmup service sends and receives emails between real accounts to establish trust with email providers like Gmail and Outlook, ensuring your campaigns land in the inbox.

step4.title: Upload Leads
step4.subtitle: Upload your leads to start reaching potential clients
step4.explanation: Import your prospect list using our CSV upload tool. Your leads should include essential information like first name, last name, email, company, and job title. Quality leads are crucial for campaign success - make sure your list is clean, targeted, and relevant to your offering.

step5.title: Create & Launch Your First Campaign
step5.subtitle: Put everything together and send your first cold outreach campaign
step5.explanation: Now you're ready to create your first campaign! Use our campaign builder to craft your email sequence, set up follow-ups, choose your leads, assign mailboxes, and configure sending schedules. Start with a small test batch to optimize your approach before scaling up.

questions.gettingStartedAns: Follow the onboarding steps to set up your account and start using the platform. Complete each step in order for the best experience.
questions.emailSetup: How do I connect my email account?
questions.emailSetupAns: Go to the email settings and follow the connection wizard. We support Gmail, Outlook, and custom SMTP configurations.
questions.domainVerification: Why do I need to verify my domain?
questions.domainVerificationAns: Domain verification improves email deliverability and helps establish trust with email providers. It's essential for successful email campaigns.
questions.contactImport: How do I import my contacts?
questions.contactImportAns: You can import contacts via CSV upload or connect your CRM. Make sure your contact list complies with anti-spam regulations.
questions.troubleshootingAns: Check our documentation first, then contact support if you need additional help. We're here to ensure your success.
